items.sentence: Tom dropped his kids off at school on his way to work.
Tom entered the bar and sat on the stool next to Mary.

She is in the habit of writing in her diary every day.
She traveled from Boston to San Francisco via Chicago.
Tom would be a better teacher if he were more patient.
Tom doesn\'t live here anymore. He\'s moved to Boston.

Tom said it didn\'t look like Mary was having any fun.
